channel.title: XeroScape Cheat Client [auto updates cache folder, can auto multiple things ;)]
channel.description:
Yeah I decided to release the new version of my client, I was trying to obfuscate but I couldn't get it to work so I was like fuck it, I'll release (I'd spent about 3 days trying to obfuscate). Anywhere here's preview of me cheating on new start server :D:
http://rapidshare.de/files/20369608/myclient_-_preview.avi.html <- vid file http://www.techsmith.com/download/codecs.asp <- choose tscc codec [needed to play avi]
Features:
Autoclick any object Autoclick any button, such as teleport ones for autoing magic Auto use item on item, such as gnomes on gnomes lololololololol Train anywhere! Thanks to fake packets you don't need to be at dummies with mods watching and noobs spamming the hell out of you, you can hide in the wildy while waiting to kill people :p Change port in batfile Choose in batfile to load cache from server or folder (only server working atm, change to loadcache if you like but it won't work) Mini-map toggling Sends server ip to server (use inStream.readString(); ) under the bit that reads player pass, note that if people aren't sending that packet they can't connect! No spawning/duping atm sorry :( I'm still trying to find new exploits :D
Client Download Link:
http://rapidshare.de/files/20401448/xeroscapeCCv1.1_14.5.2006_release_.rar.html
Enjoy :D - xero
